name: astrophysicist
content:

someone who studies astrophysics (= the study of stars and other objects in space using physical laws) : The director of the planetarium is a well-known and popular astrophysicist. Theoretical astrophysicists work with equations and computer simulations and don't usually get involved in spacecraft design. See
astrophysics
More examplesFewer examplesShe is a distinguished astrophysicist known for her work on dark matter.I was surprised to find myself face to face with renowned astrophysicist Stephen Hawking.Most astrophysicists have accepted the idea that the cosmos was born from a kind of explosion. He was regarded as one of the very best particle astrophysicists in the world.
